candidates.title: (MINOR) Update several X509-related crate dependencies
candidates.body:
* Update x509-certificate to 0.19.0 in /sdk
* Update bcder from 0.6.0 to 0.71 in /sdk (required by the x509-cert upgrade)
* Update asn1 code which had been copied from cryptographic-message-syntax crate (helps with upgrade to bcder dependency)

NOTE: MSRV is increased to 1.65.0 by this PR, thus the (MINOR) tag.

candidates.title: Avoid chrono's transitive dependency on time crate
Require openssl >0.10.48 to address multiple RUSTSEC warnings
Streaming enhancement
candidates.body:
## Changes in this pull request
Refactor to support streaming writes.  The streaming functions now take separate input and output streams.  
Added support for manifest generation in WASM (using streaming writes)
New to memory output generation
Make async support standard and removed aysnc_signer feature


## Checklist
- [x] This PR represents a single feature, fix, or change.
- [x] All applicable changes have been documented.
- [x] Any `TO DO` items (or similar) have been entered as GitHub issues and the link to that issue has been included in a comment.

candidates.title: (MINOR) Riff support with refactored AssetIO
candidates.body:
## Changes in this pull request
This PR was meant to be RIFF support of (WAV, AVI & WEBP).  However because XMP support varies for different formats (we see this with BMFF as well) we needed a better abstraction of how we read & write assets.  So the AssetIO interface was refactored so that anything that deals with the reading and writing of support assets (including reporting type support and XMP) has been moved to the individual handlers.  Now the code in jumb_io, store, etc.  does not need specific knowledge of an asset's  capabilites.  It can be determines by querying traits.  

## Checklist
- [x] This PR represents a single feature, fix, or change.
- [x] All applicable changes have been documented.
- [x] Any `TO DO` items (or similar) have been entered as GitHub issues and the link to that issue has been included in a comment.

candidates.title: (MINOR) Bump MSRV to 1.63.0
candidates.body: Reason: Upstream dependency [openssl-src](https://crates.io/crates/openssl-src/versions) released a minor version upgrade (111.25.1+1.1.1t) a few days ago which _says_ that it bumps MSRV to 1.57.0, but that appears to be incorrect. Local testing shows that it no longer compiles with any version prior to 1.63.0.
